title: La malheureuse famille Calas  (The Unfortunate Calas Family)
dimensions: sheet (trimmed within plate mark): 36 x 45.8 cm (14 3/16 x 18 1/16 in.)
attribution: Jean-Baptiste Delafosse, after Louis de Carrogis, called Carmontelle
creditline: Gift of John O'Brien, in Honor of the 50th Anniversary of the National Gallery of Art
